meanings.definition: The action of taking something for one's own use, typically without the owner's permission.
meanings.sent1: The theft was an appropriation of the neighbor's tools.
meanings.sent2: The appropriation of the painting was done secretly.
meanings.sent3: The cat's appropriation of the dog's bed caused a funny scene.
meanings.sent4: Her appropriation of ideas from different books made her writing unique.
meanings.sent5: The appropriation of cookies from the jar was evident by the crumbs on the table.

meanings.definition: The allocation of funds or resources for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The government's appropriation of funds for education was welcomed.
meanings.sent2: The appropriation of resources for the project was carefully planned.
meanings.sent3: The appropriation of snacks for the party left everyone satisfied.
meanings.sent4: His appropriation of time towards studying paid off in good grades.
meanings.sent5: The appropriation of tools for the construction site was efficient and organized.

meanings.definition: The act of incorporating elements from another source into one's own work.
meanings.sent1: Her appropriation of music samples added depth to her song.
meanings.sent2: The artist's appropriation of colors from nature was evident in the painting.
meanings.sent3: The appropriation of jokes from his friend's stand-up routine made him the life of the party.
meanings.sent4: His appropriation of dance moves from different styles created a unique performance.
meanings.sent5: The appropriation of flavors from various cuisines made the dish a culinary masterpiece.
